key.name: apps
key.description: You can setup new launchers with ICON_NAME:EXEC_CMD;

key.name: ignored-plugins
key.summary: All listed plugins would be ignored
key.description: If you do not want to load plugin example.so then add it with example.so;SOME_OTHER;...

key.name: time-code
key.summary: Will set the way time is displayed
key.description: It is used by the clock plugin - 1 - 24H with sec - 2 - 24H - 3 - 12H with sec - 4 - 12H

key.name: utc-time
key.description: If enabled, UTC is used as default time zone. This is maybe usefull for scince operations...

key.name: show-app-menu
key.summary: Show the built-in app launcher in the panel
key.description: You should only disable this, if you want to use a plugin as launcher

key.name: show-window-list
key.summary: Show the built-in Window List in the panel
key.description: This is in a very early phase, so you can might disable it

key.name: window-list-refresh-rate
key.description: Lower Values have problems when trying to click the button, higher values takes longer to refresh

key.name: window-list-title-width
key.description: How long should the window title be if it could

key.name: window-list-only-hidden
key.summary: Should there be only hidden windows in the panel
key.description: Should there be only hidden windows in the panel or should you see all active windows
